price: Ka ce: "Dã dai kũ, kunã mallakar* taskõkin rahamar Ubangijĩna, a lõkacin, haƙĩƙa dã kun kãme dõmin tsõron ƙãrẽwar taskõkin. Kuma mutum yã kasance mai ƙwauro ne."
arabic: قُل لَّوۡ أَنتُمۡ تَمۡلِكُونَ خَزَآئِنَ رَحۡمَةِ رَبِّيٓ إِذٗا لَّأَمۡسَكۡتُمۡ خَشۡيَةَ ٱلۡإِنفَاقِۚ وَكَانَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ قَتُورٗا
footnotes: * Muƙãrana a tsakãnin kyautar mutum da rõwarsa ga dũkiyar da ya mallaka.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul law antum tamlikūna khazāina raḥmati rabbī idhan la-amsaktum khashyata al-infāqi wakāna al-insānu qatūran
